review_text: Great spot, would love to go during the summer as well

Place was great. Close to restaurants and our family.
Everything we needed. Plenty of elbow room for all to have space and still be in same space.

Very clean! So much is new, high quality and all in great working condition. The home is very welcoming and has many special touches.
Despite the poor fall weather, we enjoyed the excellent views!
We had prompt and friendly communications before our stay and Cadillac has a lot to offer. Definitely recommend!
We loved our stay here - I just wish we could’ve stayed longer! Beautiful, clean home with everything we needed. Great location!
Great place to stay , clean , comfortable, quiet neighborhood
Very clean. Nice area on the lake. Home was comfortable and had a lot to keep the kids busy. We would definitely stay here again.

Had a great time at this house - perfect for our needs. Good location, quiet neighborhood, excellent amenities: enjoyed the kayaks, paddle boat, and fire pit. Well appointed kitchen. Clean and comfortable furniture and beds. We felt very at home. Thank you.
The house was perfect for a nice family up north get away. Host really though of everything the guest would need. Perfect location right on a cove connected to Lake Mitchell.
A beautiful setting, with coffee by the water, and lots of water activities!
We had the best time! Beautiful house, with well stocked amenities and comfortable beds. Loved fishing off the dock, kayaking and the gorgeous sunsets. Highly recommend!
It was exactly what we needed! A great cozy place close to the resort where we attended a family wedding. Kelli was very kind and responsive.
This was our 3rd time staying at Kelli's. Every time we've throughly enjoyed our stay. The location is beautiful and we noticed some updates since last year. Highly recommend staying here!

This place was one of the cleanest and best stocked AirBnbs I’ve ever stayed in! There were so many thoughtful touches throughout the house. It had everything you could need. The location and layout of the house were perfect for us! I would definitely stay here again if in the area!
The location was very convenient to Caberfae Ski Resort, it had all the amenities needed for a week long stay, a quiet and cozy place. Hosts kept in touch when needed are were very nice.

Kelli's place is located just minute drive from Caberfae, if you planning a ski weekend it's a great place. The home was clean organized and cozy. My group of friends and myself al greatly enjoyed staying there and plan on coming back.

The chalet was PERFECT for our family of 4 for our ski weekend at Caberfae. Only 2 minute drive to the slopes! The house was so cozy and there was plenty of room. Kelli paid attention to detail with anything we could have forgotten by providing snacks, toys for kids, DVDs, toiletries! Everything was very well labeled. The wood burning fireplace was cozy after a day of skiing. Our kids also loved running around in the spacious backyard. We definitely will return and stay at the Chalet!
Very nice little place close to the ski hill. The host is a rockstar, everything is labeled and spelled out for you. Would definitely recommend.
First time using, couldn’t ask for a better experience. Kellie was amazing and helpful. Would recommend and will be booking again.

We had to cancel our U.P. ski trip due to lack of snow, so we did a lower Michigan tour of ski areas that make snow, ending with the last few days at Caberfae Peaks. The proximity to Caberfae was perfect. The house was everything it was described to be and more. Check in and check out were very easy. Everything was extremely clean. The working fireplace was an incredible addition of ambiance to our ski trip. There were also helpful instructions posted around the house for how to operate various appliances (including the fireplace), and it was clear a lot of thought was put into the little things that helped make the stay enjoyable, from oatmeal and light snacks on the buffet, to ground coffee with your choice if drip coffee maker or french press, and numerous types of glasses, bowls, plates, utensils, kitchen appliances, and more. I could go on but it was clear Kelli has put a lot of thought an effort into making our stay perfect!

Kelli was an awesome host and very responsive. She has thought of everything! She has written instructions for anything you might need. The house was very clean! We have stayed at a lot of Air BNBs and this is one of the best so far. Kelli has all the kitchen items you may need. She has coffee, hot cocoa and snacks, should you need any. There's tons of puffy towels, hand towels and wash clothes. She's even left a bin of toiletries that her guests may be missing! There's a washer and dryer in the basement, as well.
Great place to stay. So close to caberfae. Kelli was a great host

The location, accomodations and wonderful host combined to allow our family to create an awseome weekend together to ski at Caberfae. We really appreciated the host's prompt communications, all of the special "touches" and amenities within the chalet and the close proximity to access skiing. The host was very kind to communicate with me that I accidently left a few of my own kitchen items behind and was willing to ensure I was reunited with them. Kelli is a very kind and gracious host! I would rebook with them again, recommend it to others and that others that book to stay at their chalet will have a very positive experience!
Beautiful and so comfortable! Great place to stay!
Great place to stay. Quick access to ski resort. Helpful host
Very charming chalet, had everything we needed and it was all was very well labeled. Warm and cozy and 2 minutes from the ski hill. Really enjoyed the stay.

Four Seasons Chalet is near many hiking paths , lakes and rivers. This is our second time staying in Caberfae at the chalet. We were able to go on beautiful hikes this time. The Chalet has everything you need to enjoy your stay in comfort. Kelli and Derek are great host and respond quickly to any questions you have.

Kelli and Derek’s place is simply amazing! Tremendous amenities, thoughtful touches and full of opportunity for making memories. Highly recommend for nature enthusiasts who love adventuring in the forest on foot, bike or skis. ☺️

The chalet is in a perfect location for easy access to explore the National Forest. Kelli and Derek provided detailed instructions and labels for checking-in and everything around the place to make it easy to get settled in and comfortable. We were extremely impressed and pleasantly surprised with all of the personal touches and attention to details for us but also our fur babies. While we didn’t have a chance to take advantage, we loved having the option to have a fire in the fireplace, a campfire or use the grills.

Kelli provided a very efficent and relaxing stay. Of the 10+ years we have been coming north for the salmon run, this cabin was our best pick so far. About 28 minutes from Tippy dam. The home was full stocked and extremely pet friendly. You can also count on Kelli to be very communicative and quick to respond. We recommend this home and host, 100%.
Great stay at Kelli’s place. She was quick to answer any questions I had.
Kelli was extremely helpful. The chalet was very clean and well stocked…everything you could need was available and extremely organized.
Great stay, clean, everything we needed!
Kelli was a wonderful host, responsive and helpful in communication. The location is quiet with nice outdoor spaces to enjoy the area.
Kelli’s place was as advertised! Nice chalet located in a beautiful area. Super clean, comfortable, & everything we needed!
The chalet was very clean and cozy. The best place we have stayed as far as being stocked with anything you could possibly want. Even firewood and a great outdoor area. Will definitely book again
Beautiful, clean cabin! We liked all the games and that we could have a bonfire. Kelli was very nice and responsive when needed. Will be staying here again next time we visit!

Our family enjoyed the chalet. Walking the area was a nice start to our day. We made dinners there and had everything we needed to cook. We also enjoyed the fire pit outside one evening and made s’mores. Sleeping Bear is an easy day trip from here.

This cabin was amazing. The host has thought of everything from charging stations to dog dishes! You literally only need to bring your own food and clothes! The place was spotless and all rooms had a fan! The two upstairs bedrooms BOTH have an AC unit which made for a very pleasant sleep during the 90 degree days we had. They include firewood for the fire pit and/or fireplace. There is also pillows galore which made my family happy! We love extra pillows! I highly recommend staying here! We will definitely be back!

cute, cozy, stay. great amenities and walkable woods nearby. quite town not too far from michigan, close by lakes and hiking. plus the ski hill in the right season. The chalet has plenty of space and a great little yard with a firepit.
We had a wonderful stay! The house was exactly as described and had everything we needed.

We loved our stay here! The place came with several “extra” items. We got in late so it was very nice to have a few snack items available to us as we settled in. The bathroom was also stocked with any extras we may have left behind. The one downfall was having to turn on the well pump. The breaker was located in the basement. The basement was clean and it was easy to access. Had it been for just my parents staying there, they would not have been able to navigate the stairs to locate the breaker. We are fortunate they were not alone! Overall a great place to stay and very nicely kept. We may be back!

Kelli’s place was amazing. We stayed there to go to a wedding at caberfae (very close). The place was perfect for the 5 of us and had the best amenities I’ve seen at an Airbnb. I highly recommend staying here and hope to come back during the winter. Book now!
Our second time staying at Kelli's place, just as enjoyable as the first time!
Great place and real close to Caberfae! We could see the house lights from the top of the Mountain! Thank you!
Absolutely perfect! We hope to come back soon!

Kelli was very accommodating and responsive throughout the entire stay. There were clear instructions throughout the house, which made everything very easy to use. My friends and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay here and loved how close it was to Caberfae. We would definitely stay here again!

5 star experience. the owners have put tons of thought and care into making our stay wonderful. lots of little touches. coffee bar, snacks, cozy throws, fireplace ready to burn(just awesome on the stormy night we had), the binder has excellent food suggestions and clear tips and tricks for the stay.
clean, very well maintained, and close to Caberfae! would definitely recommend and use again!
Great place to stay for a ski weekend!
Great place - fit all our guests and pets nicely! Clean and organized. Super close to Caberfae. Would go back!
Very Clean
Had everything we could need. Lots of nice details, great for skiing.

This is the second time we have stayed at this chalet. It is the perfect place for us. My husband, daughter, and I stayed there for 2 nights. The area is very peaceful and Caberfae was in sight. You can see the peaks lit up at night.
My daughter enjoyed the toys, coloring books, games, and movies. I loved how everything is labeled, which makes it easy for us to know which switch turns on what, etc. Check-in and checkout was a breeze.
They have thought of everything and have a step stoop for Kids in the bathroom for the sink, miscellaneous toiletries in case you forget something at home, and firewood. We appreciated the shared condiment tray in the refrigerator.
Oh, and thr chalet is super clean, too! We plan to be back for sure! Thanks Kelli!

This is a lovely and extremely well equipped stay. Many amenities including snacks, coffee, and games. And pet friendly for our furry family member! We enjoyed the fireplace with ample firewood included. The kitchen was well equipped with utensils, pots, pans, everything we could think of. Everything was perfectly clean. We had plenty of room for our family of 5. Last thing, and it might seem a little odd to mention, the tap water was the best we've had, it tasted so fresh! Thank you so much for the terrific stay!

Four Season chalet is in a beautiful area in Caberfae. The lodge and ski lodge is minutes away from the home. You can see the ski hills from their front windows. Very peaceful area to stay in. Highly recommended staying here. They provide plenty of amenities for you to enjoy your stay. Loved the natural fireplace!
Fantastic place.. great owner.. we left an item behind and Kelli was willing to mail to us.. will be back
Loved the cabin it was incredibly clean and very homie.

Kelli is a great communicator, and quick to respond with any (and all!) questions. Her place looks very similar to the photos shown. Unfortunately, we didn’t realize her place doesn’t have central air conditioning (our mistake) but not having window AC units in every bedroom made sleeping a bit challenging if you’re used to sleeping in cooler temps. Also- the cleaning fee is the most expensive I’ve seen at an AirBnB rental ($175)! What made it a tougher pill to swallow is that in the “check out directions”, we were told to do all dishes and take out the trash (which we did). All the fees nearly doubled the price of our stay. In my opinion, the place is nice but not worth over $400/night.

The property is a few miles from Caberfae ski resort. Fairly basic, but we had everything we needed during an extended stay. Washer/ dryer in the basement and a/c units on first and second floor were a big plus. The area felt somewhat remote during the summer, but always safe! 40 min from Lake Michigan. During our stay in the summer we visited the upper peninsula, mackinac island, traverse city, petosky, Frankfort, sleeping bear dunes, etc.
The bathroom has been nicely remodeled and there are lots of hooks in bathroom, entry and even in upstairs bedroom which I really appreciate. Also a few USB outlets! The property was very clean and there were sufficient toiletries and supplies for our small family for almost 6 weeks.
The host was great- very accommodating and checked in with us to make sure we had everything we needed. There was a wasp nest and they had it scheduled to be removed within an hour of being notified of it. I have no doubt that they would promptly handle any other more critical issues at the property!
Well equipped with games and other forms of family fun.
Very comfortable stay to be close to our family reunion. Well equipped and the protein/nut bars were a nice bonus.
Great accommodations, host, & communication. Good value. Very quiet & laid back area.

A great forest getaway. Six guests and some furry friends were comfortable for the entirety of a long weekend. Minutes from Cadillac and Manistee make for nice day trips. We will definitely consider the Chalet for future visits to Up North Michigan!

This is one of the best Airbnbs we have stayed at. We have family in the Caberfae neighborhood and we're thrilled when we learned this chalet was up as an Airbnb. We stayed there for 5 nights and 6 days. The chalet is cozy and well appointed. We were impressed with all of the little details and notes.
The towels in the bathroom are super fluffy and smelled really good. I enjoyed sitting on the cute deck while drinking my morning coffee. We made a couple trips into Cadillac and rented a pontoon boat and went around Lake Cadillac. We also stopped at some stores in downtown Cadillac and were thoroughly surprised and happy to see there was a Farmers Market on Friday and a small splash pad for my daughter to run through. The temperatures were high 80s/low 90s and the window ac units helped make things more comfortable, although we loved having the windows open to feel the breeze and hear the birds and trees.
We give it 5 stars and will be coming back in the future.

Absolutely well planned in advance for making guests comfortable and feeling at home. From kitchen to bedrooms to laundry room, everything was ready for our most enjoyable stay. I was truely amazed at the thought that must have been put in to making this vacation, guest house, a pleasant stay. If I didn't live a thousand miles away, I would stay there every chance I had too get away. I would absolutely recommend the stay here too all my friends and family. Thanks so much for the stay in hospitality.

The chalet was very clean & the Kelli had provided everything we needed. We really appreciated the instructions she provided both before we arrived & in the chalet & we liked how well things were labeled in the chalet. It made staying there very easy & comfortable. The chalet is very pet friendly & located in a nice neighborhood for walking with our dog.
Perfect location, great amenities, and a very comfortable stay!
Great place for a ski weekend. Place is very clean and so much more updated than pictures show. We really enjoyed ourselves in our tiny “up north” getaway.

Located less than a mile from Caberfae, this is a great place to stay for a ski weekend. Very clean throughout, including sparkling tile in the shower and a clean kitchen with all needed items (we notice these things!). We were particularly delighted by the space in the basement for staging ski gear, and really appreciated the community snow plowing (whoever does this for y'all, they're awesome!) -- the driveway and neighborhood roads were routinely plowed, so happy not to have had to shovel! Charming, comfortable cozy space, nice smart tv (we streamed the winter olympics in the late evening), comfortable beds, and enough space to spread out 2 families. Bonus pet friendly! so nice to bring our little snow loving cockapoo along. The view from the front window of the ski slopes lit up at night while enjoying the fireplace was great too. Easy check in, very responsive hosts.
1 of the best air bnb’s we’ve been too! The house is will exceed your expectations and the owners are extremely helpful! My friends and I couldn’t have been happier about our stay!
Kelli was an amazing host! Her chalet is super clean and the beds are so comfy. She is very responsive and our group can’t wait to book her next time for our annual ski trip!
Excellent property near Caberfae and Mackenzie skiing. Hosts were very helpful. The property is in immaculate condition.
This chalet has all the amenities you need for a perfect up north getaway. It was very clean upon arrival. Would definitely recommend, 5 stars.
Great place to stay! Highly recommend!

This property is as cute as they come. Nestled at the base of Caberfae Ski Resort, in the Center of the Manistee National Forest. Fishing, Hunting, Kayaking, Hiking, Snowmobiling, it's all here. The accommodations are new, clean and comfortable. Our host Kelli was very friendly and quik to respond to all our needs. In the top 1% for Airbnb's. If you are looking to stay in the Beautiful Michigan Northeast, look no farther. Chalet at Caberfae is the place. We will definitely be back!
Thanks again, Melanie! your place was great and you were a pleasure to work with !

Our stay was really welcoming and comfortable! We had a issue with the plumbing regarding the sink and one of the bathrooms, and they came in less then 10 minutes and got it all fixed up and were very kind and apologetic. Definitely really kind people and beautiful spacious home, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

I cant express how wonder our company stay was.
The house is very cute, spacious, and very clean. We definitely will be staying again in the future. :)
Enjoyed our stay. Exactly what we were looking for during a weekend away with our young child. Would definitely stay again. Thank you.
We will for sure stay here again. When we come to visit my brother. I have made you my favorite on airbnb!!!

We were looking for a quiet, restful place while visiting family in Cadillac. This house provided that for us. Nicer than staying in a hotel. While definitely an older farmhouse, it was clean with a comfortable bed, and a well appointed kitchen.
we had a great stay. house isn't far from town, or Cabrafae. quiet location.

This location was perfect for an extended family gathering. We all arrived at the same time from different locations and relaxed together for the weekend. The house is perfect for a multifamily stay. Warm and welcoming. The pizza recommendation was perfect. We enjoyed playing games and watching deer in the field through the living room windows. The house was very, very, clean upon arrival and the host let us know when it was ready. The kitchen had plenty of cooking items and lots of seasonings/spices. We have no suggestions for improvement.

We loved the house. Plenty of room, clean, nice quiet location; about 20 minutes from Caberfae but it is a pretty drive, and it didn't feel that long. Host was responsive to any/all questions. We are already planning to book next year:)

We were there for a quick weekend for a ski trip in the area. The place was very accommodating and had everything you would need! We had a hiccup with the plumbing the second night and were not able to use restrooms but David was very responsive and made things right without a question. If we are ever back in the area we would have no issue booking this again! It was clean, warm and peaceful.

Very comfortable beds, coach, and pillows. Lots of spices and variety of cooking items. Alot of renovations and still a few more to go, but didn't affect quality of stay. Annoying that there's no place to put luggage or dressers. Heat made clicking sound when cane on. It didnt bother me, but bothered small kids with me.
it was great 20 mins from the mountain ready to get food clean great house

This place was SPOTLESS when we arrived. The bed sheets and blankets/comforters smells like fresh laundry (as they should, but these were perfect). Tons of space. We had ten people and we fit very comfortably, especially in the huge living room or dining room. All amenities were there. Laundry room. Great communication with the host. I think we found our annual spot while skiing at Caberfae. It is a 15-20 min drive to the ski hill but not a big deal.
This house was beautiful. It reminded me of my houses in the country. I loved it and it was very clean and perfect thank you I will be back

This home was perfect for our family of 5. Plenty of space to spread out. Kitchen was very well stocked. Beds were comfortable. Very nice decor including the Christmas decorations- it made it all feel very cozy and festive for our NYE stay. The location was great - it was in a peaceful and quiet setting, yet only 23 minutes to Caberfae for skiing, and only 8 minutes from great restaurants and stores, etc. We would definitely stay here again!

Wow! This was the perfect place for my family to stay while they were in town to visit us. Our house was just too small. The place was so welcoming and everything was prepared for their stay beautifully. We loved the home. Enough spaces for kids to play. It really could host up to 10 people easily.
The welcome basket was a nice touch!
I had prompt response times with any questions I had. Very accommodating host!
We had a great stay, very clean and attentive accommodating host!

David responded to messages within five minutes. He was very helpful and suggested a local pizza place that was delicious. The home was clean and fresh. I made a big meal for friends and the kitchen had everything I needed for cooking. Great place to stay!
I very recommended, nice house
Thanks for a great stay.
Awesome stay! House was great and I’m a great location. 10/10!

This place was amazing for us. We had a wedding at Cabrafae Peaks it was a short drive. We did eat at a local restaurant down the road which was also amazing. The weather did not cooperated with us and we would have sat around the fire pit however we played cards and watched movies during our down time. The place was super clean and the beds were very comfortable. If you’re in this area this is the place to go. Your hosts were very quick on their responses at all times.
Beautiful place , quite at night close to everything we wanted to do . Had a great time , very relaxing.

The Creek View Farmhouse was exactly as described. It was spacious, spotlessly clean, the beds were super comfortable and the linens were extra soft. We found everything we needed in the kitchen and did not want for anything. We tried a couple recommendations from the house manual and found them to be great! David's communication was timely and thorough. Would definitely recommend for a large or small group.
Great home. finding a four bedroom house with a good deal of living space was fantastic. Immaculate, as described and fantastic communication.
Everything was exactly as advertised. Great experience.
Very accommodating and we felt right at home. Our stay was short, but I would recommend this location for any traveler.

My family and I were all extremely happy with our stay. Beautiful house that felt like home. Very well stocked kitchen and cozy beds! David was very quick to respond and helpful. We had an action packed few days and we’re so grateful for the flexibility with a later checkout. My family loves to stay in the area and everyone said they’d gladly book the house again. You can tell this is a well loved home.
Wonderful home.

This was our second time staying at David’s place. Just like last time everything was wonderful. The house was very clean and spacious. The location is great. We will definitely stay here again next time we come to Cadillac.

David's place was excellent! My group and I were staying here for a wedding weekend and it served as a great home base. The house was bigger than I expected and had everything that we needed. I'll definitely stay here if I'm in the area again!

We were highly impressed with our stay! The home was beautifully decorated, has a cozy seating area around a firepit outside, it had everything needed & more. They have carefully thought through every detail! We may never stay at a hotel again! Thank you for providing such a charming home & enjoyable stay!

This was our first AirBNB experience. We could not be happier with our choice to stay at Davids home. The home was much larger then we thought. Spacious, clean. Close enough to Traverse City for a day trip. Very quiet. We would definitely rent from him again .
Great host, I highly recommend this stay. The house was very cozy and clean.
It was a cute house, with lots of extra things to help us have a good weekend.
Great place to stay! Clean and spacious
it was nice.
thank u once again for everything we will use u again
Comfortable beds and couch. Spacious old farmhouse with modern decor touches. Great parking for trailer and truck.
great location
We had a great stay! The house was clean. Everything was exactly as described!

We had a great stay with my husband's family here! Plenty of room for 7 adults and 2 children. Very homey feel with everything we needed and a beautiful outdoor space for the kids to play. Enjoyed the reasonable drive to Caberfae for skiing as well. Hosts were very responsive and quickly came over when we locked ourselves back. Would highly recommend!

Very nice home.
Had everything we could think of. Fully stocked kitchen. Plenty of room for the adults and kids to spread out & feel at home.
House was clean and it had all the space we needed. We went to Caberfae and it was only 25 minutes away. We ate in Cadillac which was 10 minutes away. Location was convenient.

This was the perfect place for our family to stay during a ski vacation. The house was well-stocked with anything we could need and we had space to dry ski gear at night and cook breakfast in the morning. The home was clean and comfortable. There was a snowstorm during the second night we stayed and the driveway was plowed early in the morning so we had no trouble getting out.

I rented David’s house for the weekend to go skiing at Caberfae. The house was 25 minutes away from the ski resort! Some of us went skiing, while others stayed back and explored the surrounding area. There were some cute shops downtown and a couple bars we went into. Everyone we met was very nice! The house was very clean and well kept and plenty of room/beds for everyone to have their own space.

Had a great time with our family. Plenty of room and loved the separate bedrooms upstairs for our kiddos. Close to town and just a short drive to Caberfae. Perfect place for our family getaway as we were looking to relax and play games and enjoy some quality family time. Had everything that we needed in the kitchen, we ate all of our meals in. A close distance to Cadillac Pathway Trails which we highly recommend as well. Thanks for providing a great place for us to stay David! Becky was also so easy to communicate with and provided a clean home for us to relax in.
David made the process easy and painless. Great place for a ski weekend with kids :)
Enjoyed the stay at David’s Creekview Farmhouse. 23 minutes to Caberfae, really close to both east and west Cadillac. Will definitely be back!
We went to Caberfae to ski and stayed at David’s place. Great house, clean, pretty decorations, and nicely priced. Super warm at night even it’s 0F outside. David is also helpful with rescheduling.
David’s place was incredibly clean, and nicely decorated. It provided a nice hub for our family during a funeral in town. I would recommend David’s place to anyone who is in Cadillac.
great place to get away in the country but also minutes away from everything you need! Definitely would come back

We loved this house! It was cozy, clean and beautiful! It’s located close to town so we were close to shopping and 20 mins from Cabrefae (which was great). There happen to be an act of God that put a kink in the weekend but David and Becky were awesome and went out of their way to put us back on track. If we are ever back in the area this place is at the top of our list!
Amazing home! Everythingwas perfect from the moment we checker in til the time we checked out. Had that old farm house feel with plenty room for a large family. Will absolutely book again!

We loved staying in this lovely farmhouse! The owners had a well-stocked kitchen as well as convenience items in the restrooms. We enjoyed the comfy beds and cozy living room. It was perfect for our family of grown children with a little one.

This home was one of the best Airbnb stays I’ve had. The home was very clean, and the homeowners went above and beyond with communication. I received a text from the owner telling me all about things to do in the area, places to eat, and local favorites. That was a nice touch. It’s important to add that the homeowners definitely didn’t spare on the small things- they had the fridge stocked with condiments, there were seasonings, lots of plates, cups, etc. Each shower had shampoo, conditioner, face wash, etc. They included charcoal for the charcoal grill. My friends and I showed up just a few minutes before check in and we had the pleasure of meeting one of the correspondents for the home (we frightened her as she was finishing up cleaning), she gave us some history on the home, and also let us know that she lived one home over- which wasn’t intrusive at all, there was still quite a bit of distance in between each house- and to PLEASE let her know if we needed anything. The beds were comfortable, and as stated before, everything was extremely clean from the bedding to the floors. 10 people comfortably stayed in the home, and we would all do it again. Not a single complaint. I’ve read through some of the other reviews for the home, just note that everything mentioned in the reviews that wasn’t up to par has been changed. Thank you for making our weekend trip stellar!

We rented David's house while we were in Michigan for our son's wedding. We were so blessed by the fact that this place fit every need we had so that our whole family could stay together....children, spouses and grandchildren. It was very clean and comfortable. There is very much attention paid to detail and it made our stay perfect!

Went for a golf trip for 8 of us. This house accommodated everyone and is spacious. Very clean. It’s def a farmhouse which is nice because it’s not too far from anything but still far enough away to just sit back and relax around the fire pit and not have to worry about neighbors. Owners have good communication. The beds were comfortable as well. The A/C units in the rooms worked great, especially if you shut the doors. Fun time and I would go back to this house again.
Thanks for sharing your house! Very cozy and comfortable.
Thank you:)

We had a wonderful stay at this place. We were in Cadillac for a wedding and this was a great place for family to be together. Everything was as advertised. Even some of the negatives in previous reviews have been addressed (new concrete patio, mattress toppers, etc). This is an old farmhouse that has been updated and they are continuing to make changes and updates. But we found it to be just what we needed.
The kitchen was more than well stocked - thank you for that. We only had one issue with the outlets in some bedrooms not working. It was immediately addressed and Becky came over to flip the breaker for us. It is a known issue they are working on so don’t let that deter your from booking.
There was ample parking since we were a full house. The LR is quite large with a large couch to accommodate lots of people and 2 extra leather recliners. The table holds 8 but there were extra chairs to squeeze in a few more people.
Thank you for the wonderful stay and the welcome basket (local wine, chocolates, and cheez its). I don’t know that our travels will ever bring us back to Cadillac but we would definitely stay here again.
Large house, great for family gatherings. Large kitchen, well stocked with everything you may need. The home was clean, bedding and towels were good quality.

The house was very clean and spacious. It’s in a quiet area but still close to town. Check in was easy. There were plenty of towels. The bathrooms even had some Q-tips, cotton balls, and sanitary products. The only negative was not all the electrical outlets worked and there were quite a few extension cords. It didn’t really affect our stay though. We enjoyed the house and would rent again.

We had a fabulous stay! The layout of the house was spacious and each room was so comfortable and well equipped. We were there on hot days but the AC units kept everyone cool. The kitchen was well stocked and the play structure outside was fun for our kids. We would definitely stay here again!

This property is an aged farmhouse with modern features that is great for families. The home is near the commercial side of town however it sits on the outskirts so it's sits on an expansive parcel of land with neighbors about a half mile away. the home itself is beautifully decorated with a mixture of old-school class that makes you think of a different time, and the comforts of a modern kitchen and bathroom. The hosts put a lot of love and thought into this home so I wish I could give it 5 stars; the cons of this property were just too many to ignore.
Backyard Porch Area-the deck is literally falling apart and sinking in. So much so that myself and other members of the family all stood in separate corners for fear that the center would cave if we sat on the patio furniture. It was so sunken in that the support of the deck reminds me of a funnel. The small swing set in the back is a death trap. I figured since they said it was for small children we'd be good-nope! My toddler put her Minnie mouse and other stuffed disney character in the swing and pushed them. The swing isn't even cemented or staked down so when she pushed the swing the entire set lifted off the ground with the momentum. As a parent just because you have use at your own risk in the guidebook does not mean that I should be exposed to such unsafe contraptions- knowing it was strategically marketed towards families who would want to use it.
The bathroom: No hot water the entire trip. I'm talking frigid temperatures
Master Bedroom: TV does not work at all because it's an Anon brand TV (cheapest Walmart offers) -luckily the living TV made up for this. However with a big family multiple screens are a must.
All in all we made memories and we loved on one another. The goals of the trip were achieved however I would not have been willing to pay so much for such major fails throughout the home. Hopefully they can make the necessary corrections.

The location: The house is located in a quiet area just outside of town (it’s about a 5-7 mins drive into downtown Cadillac). It’s just up the street from a lake with a small beach for swimming, and the area is dark enough for some great stargazing on a clear night!
