This was a great place to stay. The Autumn colors were amazing. Everybody loved it. Highly recommend!
Very nice and clean cottage with all the amenities . Right on a canal that leads to the lake.
We felt so comfortable here we stayed an extra night! Leann was so fast at responding and helping with anything we needed. Place is so cute and cozy and a great location! We would stay here again :)
Leeann’s place was great - cozy, peaceful, but with all creature comforts covered. The lovely screened in patio was a bonus!

Better stay than in June 2022 - additional improvements/changes made the stay more enjoyable !
Cannot wait to book for next year !!

If you want a Little place on the canal and kinda private for the area, this is the place. It has a larger lot than those on the lakeside so you're not so close to the neigh or yet you'restill on the water. Fished right in the backyard! Hostess was quick at responding to any and all messages and very accommodating. Would def stay again!! Even the neigh ors were splendid.
Excellent location - great stay!
Leeann's place is wonderful! We enjoyed sitting in the screened-in gazebo, watching people kayaking by. It was very quiet & peaceful.

My wife and I enjoyed our stay. The location was what we wanted and the accommodations were what we expected.
Excellent value and very clean and comfortable!
This house is in an amazing area for peace and quiet but has amenities to keep the family busy. Such a good value. Would highly recommend.

Great place to stay! We stayed at Leeann's place for our Traverse City and Sleeping Bear Dunes park visit. So we were not able to explore Cadillac. Leeann was very responsive and helped us by going out of the way when we left something at the place and checked out. Thank you Leeann!

this is a great place to stay. it is super nice, and very well maintained plus the owners go out of the way to have small details ready for guests. I would absolutely stay here again. my family loved this property.
This cottage is perfect! Exactly as listed. Cute, clean, and great location for day trips or just enjoying some downtime. I will be staying at Leann’s cottage in the future.

Leeann was a wonderful & generous host! Easy check in & out. Loved having the kayaks at our disposal, and Leeann even had wood delivered when she realized there was none at the house!Cute, cozy place. Very serene setting. Would definitely visit again 🙂
great place
We loved every minute!
Really enjoyed our return trip to Leanne’s cottage. My daughters especially enjoyed the kayaks and the big yard for enjoying a campfire.
Great cottage, perfect for couple or family get away! Everything you need for comfortable stay.

LeAnn’s place was a great little gem. Our boys loved fishing off the canal and even caught a Walleye! The house was clean and perfect for our little family. Thanks again for opening up your lake house.

This home is wonderful. It is a very peaceful setting. The yard is very spacious for games and having fun. The screened in porch is great at night for getting away from bugs. We would definitely recommend this home to others wanting to enjoy the Cadillac area.

We had a wonderful time at Leann’s place. It was pleasantly well stocked with so many of the extras - condiments, salt/pepper, disposable plates, and even some canned goods. She had campfire wood all ready for us. My family enjoyed taking out the two single person kayaks. There are also two inflatable double person kayaks to use and several life jacket for the short trip on the canal to reach Lake Mitchell. We look forward to returning. Leann had great communication and was so helpful both prior to the visit and if we had any questions.

This was our first experience with airbnb and it was fantastic. The home delivered exactly as promised in the pictures and the description provided by the hostess. There is something extra special about returning to a home (instead of a hotel) after a day out on the lake and the beaches...something that made us feel warmer inside. And all the hard work that Leeann has put into making this house a home is responsible for those feelings.
The inlet to the lake is simply delightful--very calm, and no mosquitos! Twice in the mornings, while munching local donuts we saw a blue heron across the water stalking his own breakfast.
The house is as neat as a pin, with every convenience for a summer stay, from central air to a hot shower. Our boys thoroughly enjoyed the kayaks as well. Leeann was a tremendous hostess. If this is a typical experience, we definitely will be using airbnb in the future!
Great location and the cottage is very cute! Updated interior and very nice, large yard on the channel.
This wonderful gem is great for families and kayakers. It was perfect for our family of four and we especially enjoyed the included kayaks! We will be back!
We loved staying here!!! So much to do and in the perfect location. Leeann was super accommodating to our family! We’ll definitely be back :)
Loved this place and the hosts so much! A great experience overall and a beautiful little spot!
Nice place but hostile neighbors ruined our family weekend. We felt unwelcome and will not be back.
Just wow !!! It was fantastic
The location and the price of the Airbnb were such a great deal for our group. Me and my group had an amazing experience staying at this beautiful Airbnb!
Nice little cottage, beautiful setting and relaxing atmosphere!
Fantastic place to relax and enjoy life !!

This cottage had everything we needed and more!! It’s the perfect house for the whole family, including your four-legged family members! We appreciated the calmness of the canal for docking our boat and fishing with easy access to the lake!

I had booked this with having a get together with some friends, and could not have had a better time. The location was beautiful! the home was very welcoming and cozy. Definitely will do this annually!

Absolutely charming cottage with a great location in Cadillac. Great communication and everything exactly as advertised. Felt right at home the moment we arrived. Only regret is that we didn’t book it longer!

I stayed here with a few friends for a slow and relaxing weekend.
Everything in the house was cozy, and setup well.
We were able to take advantage of near by hiking trails, and nature. While we didn’t spend much time on the lake, it was nice being so close, and with access through a canal.
I can’t wait to stay here again.
Nice place , quiet summer cottage

Leeanns place was very cute and cozy! We were just there for the night and we’re very comfortable with the accommodations. Everything was exactly as pictured and described and definitely will recommend her place to others! Communication was fast and spot on and Leeann was extremely friendly!

lovely little cottage with a beautiful view. Great location. Leeann is more than accommodating. spend waster weekend with my family there and we most definitely didn't want to leave by the end of our stay. we will be returning over the sumer months
Very nice and peaceful place to stay. The rooms are very clean and organized. The host also prepared variety of snacks that were very helpful for calming down kids.
This was the perfect place to stay. Close to everything we were in town for, close to restaurants but far enough away it was quiet.

This was a great place. We will most likely use this place again next time we need to stay in Cadillac over night during the winter months. Place was very spacious and comfortable. We stayed here with another family of 3 and might invite another family next time. There was one room we did not even use.
Amazing stay!! We will definitely be back!
Great place to stay!

This was a church basement however it was amazing they thought of everything. Other than walking down a few stairs there is nothing church basement about it. Photos are accurate this was an amazing space to spend time with family. Plenty of room for everyone.

We loved this location! This was a quick girl's trip, and it was perfect. We each had our own beautifully decorated room, a huge comfy couch in the living room with a large tv, and a wide-open kitchen with a bar to sit at. We were all able to socialize around the kitchen counter comfortably. However, the best part was waking up to the beautiful horses next door. They are out in the pasture at sunrise. We made our coffee and sat outside to enjoy it. This place is beautiful inside and out and super clean which is a must for me! We can’t wait to come back in the summer and enjoy the outside more.
The only thing that we would recommend if you book is to bring your own coffee and creamer if you are a snob like me and don't drink regular store brand coffee or powdered cream. Other than that, lots of extras like bottled water, some boxed food and candy.
Great place to stay.
Great location,right on lake Mitchell. House was warm and inviting. Stephanie was very responsive and helpful. Will be back hopefully next time we will have more ice to go ice fishing
The home was wonderful. Very spacious and clean! Would definitely visit again in the future…
We had an outstanding family gathering at this very nice unique family-style home with an awesome view of Lake Mitchell. This home was a perfect fit for us.

Great house for a larger group as the living areas are large, big table so you can all sit around together and beautiful big windows to view the lake. Kitchen is very big as well. Communication was very good as well. Very easy to find the home and location was great.
We enjoyed our stay , had beautiful weather to enjoy the lake view. Love the Cadillac area.

I've been to many airbnbs and this one was the most welcoming. Just something about the vibe of the home was so cozy and peaceful. Also one of the most stocked homes I've stayed at. Everything you could think of was in the kitchen cabinets to the bathroom cabinet to the hallway cabinets. Matthew was very quick to respond to any questions/concerns I had. The family loved the home, inside and out. Maybe the only concern they had was just the old furniture (couches and mattresses). But that wasn't a big enough concern for us not to be back!
Wonderful stay - we will definitely be back. Beautiful location, quiet and had everything we needed for our stay.
Large open floor plan that was conducive for our family and guest. Minor updates needed but overall the home was perfect for the stay in Cadillac and the water just added an addition perk
This was such an enjoyable stay. The hosts were responsive and helpful, and the location was fantastic. We will be back!
Roomy. Need to repair windows so you can open all the way. Blinds in bedrooms need replacing. My family enjoyed our stay.

We spent a week at Idlewind with various of our 6 kids and 15 grandkids joining us periodically throughout the week. It was wonderful for littles -- very shallow and easy lake to play in! Didn't catch many fish, but had a great time trying! Great interactions with the hosts, and even the neighbor was friendly and offered any assistance we might need! The kids played a zillion lawn games and put a lot of miles on our kayaks and Stephannie's paddle boards. In spite of the rain and cooler temps (especially appreciated by the Arizona branch!), we had a fabulous vacation for all.

We had a wonderful time on the lake, the house had everything we ever needed and more. It was cozy, comfortable, and roomy with many games/books/puzzles. The seating was large enough for family/friends dinner, we also enjoyed meals outdoors by the water. The water was shallow and warm, kids were in and out all the time. We appreciate hospitality and great communication before and during our stay. We also went fishing a lot on our boat and had great luck with picture-worthy fish. The downtown area was nice too and we were surprised to feel in town while in the middle of nature. The weather changed a lot for us on the lake too, from windy cold to super hot - so be ready to adapt quickly. Bonfire nights were fun and the lake is very quiet. Thanks to Stephanie and Matt for sharing their wonderful home with us.

Overall the stay was great! The outside of the house needs a lot of maintenance and cleaning. The screen door on the side of the house needs to be fix, we couldn’t keep the door open for air flow because the screen was broken. The inside was clean and just as described. Lake Mitchell is beautiful and great for swimming!
Great place to stay with a lot of things to do close by. I would definitely recommend.

Absolutely wonderful view. Such a unique nostalgic home. Loved the original woodwork and loving touches that made our experience delightful. We found the beds so comfortable and appreciated all the thoughtful accommodations. Our stay with seven sisters was very nice.
Great location on the lake.
Stephanie’s place on Lake Mitchell was fantastic. Great location, place was clean, and Stephanie was a very responsive and helpful host. Would definitely stay again!
Great place and host! We will stay again forsure.

This was our second stay at this lovely home. It is perfect for our multiage family of 3 generations! There are so many sleeping options and more than ample space to spread out for various activities. A favorite spot was at the large round table in the game room that overlooks the lake! We had 2 large jigsaw puzzles going and were entertained by watching the ice fishing action. The kitchen is awesome band we’ll-equipped with everything we needed. Great bath/shower and very comfortable beds! This won’t be our last time staying at this gorgeous property!

We stayed with 7 of us and had a lot of room plus room for more. The whole house was stocked with all the things you need. It was nice having everything you need in the house without needing to go buy everything. Great place to stay with some cool local bars and coffee shops.

The lake house is one of our favorite places to visit. It is perfect for all family types, we have a family of 8 and it accommodated us perfectly. Plenty of space for everyone to sleep, sit, and eat. The location is perfect, just minutes from the Cadillac West area with bowling, shopping, dining, and skiing. Downtown Cadillac is 10 minutes away with several shops, restaurants, a movie theatre, ice skating, more bowling, and so much more. The house has plenty of linens provided as well as everything you need to make your stay feel like home.
Couldn't have found a place that was better for us then this location. Great waking up in the morning on the lake and a very convenient walk to grab a hot cup of coffee.
The home was perfect for our needs, wedding weekend in Cadillac. Would love to return and bring a boat during summer months! Loved the view of the water from the very large round table.
Awesome spot for a large group right on the water!
Great location and beautiful home. Easy to communicate with and the place is exactly as described.

Our stay on the lake was wonderful. It was our 2nd year and our family enjoyed it immensely. We look forward to coming back next year.
Our hosts were very accommodating. A nice home, and a great location.

Our friends group had a great time at Matthew and Stephanie’s lake house. The communication was super easy and quick and the place looks exactly like it does on the pictures. The neighborhood is very conveniently located in Cadillac and it’s a great home with amazing views! Don’t hesitate to stay here and I would absolutely recommend friend groups and families to stay here. Thanks again for your hospitality.

Very spacious home. The dining table overlooking the lake is a perfect place to have a meal. Sitting outsit and having a meal is great too. The lake views are delightful. The kitchen is well equipped for all your cooking needs. Want great ice cream, head across the street to Thistys. It is pretty charming. The bathroom on the main floor is large, larger than you could ever need. Home has a lot of craftsmen details if you like that sort of thing. Point on the lake. The water is only about 3-4 feet deep for a VERY long way out (think like 100 ft or more). It is sandy and rocky (you may want to bring water shoes). This is nice for kids, don't have to worry about them getting in over their heads. If you have blow up floating chairs, good place for those too. Star gazing is delightful and the bonfire area is nice. A great summer getaway for me and gal pals.

We had a wonderful time at Idlewind, a perfect vacation to celebrate my moms birthday. The house is very spacious, we had plenty of room- never felt on top of one another. It was a great location, easy to find and centrally located to many other destinations. Communication was great with the hosts. We hope to be back someday. ❤️
Our stay was very nice. The place is very kid friendly. The kids enjoyed the sand and water so much. We would stay again.

This place was perfect for our family vacation. Super spacious, great location, and all the comforts of home. It has a mix of new updated furnishings and an old cottage feel. The kitchen is gorgeous and very roomy. Perfect for buffet style dinners once you figure out the induction stove top. Lots of seating throughout the home, and all the beds were very comfortable. No waking up with a back ache. And the lake is perfect for little kiddos as it is very shallow for a long way out. Just don’t forget your water shoes as it is rather rocky but hardly any seaweed. We loved the paddle boards and caught several nice fish during our stay. Definitely a place we would recommend for those looking for a great place to host a big family gathering.

Our family had a wonderful stay. The house was spacious enough for our group, which included 5 adults and 4 children. The kitchen was spacious and well stocked with all the cookware and utensils needed. And views of the lake from the large dining room table were very welcoming throughout the day. Living the “lake life” sums up our experience. From water activities like paddle boarding, provided by the host, to fun backyard games, we thoroughly enjoyed our time at the property. We would happily return and make more memories together as a family.

Overall we enjoyed our stay. The house met our needs and is in a great location. An assortment of fun items were available for use to enjoy our time together as a family and on the water. Quiet location with plenty of shade to hide away from the heat. Great parking spaces out front. Proximity to the convenience store across the street was great. The ice cream is amazing? The old gal has a lot of character and with some attention could be quite the charmer.
What disappointed me was the overall condition of the property and lack of maintenance. There seems to be quite a bit of deferred maintenance (roof, gutters, carpets, windows, grounds).
First impressions are important and this home failed on many levels. Don't expect the cleanliness of a 5 star hotel. Consider this more like a family or friend's home that doesn't have time for maintenance and you dropped in unannounced.

Step back into history at this old lake house. Nice location. Good communication with the host. Loved the coffee they supplied. Everything is very basic but its a nice place to have the family gather. Great big card table for everyone!
Great location and great hosts! Love the lake and all the wildlife! The location is close to a stores and restaurants which is extremely handy!

This house is amazing; absolutely surpassed all of our expectations! 7 of us came for a memorial day vacation, and the house was so large that we didn't use half the rooms. Generally when I am on vacation, I explore the area and don't spend much time where I'm sleeping- but we only left the airbnb once! We spent the whole weekend in the water, backyard, and dining room playing games with that great view. We are planning on making this an annual trip because we all loved the house so much!
Great place!

What a wonderful home right on the shores of Lake Mitchell! We stayed for 4 days and we’re able to prepare for our daughters wedding in the Cadillac area. All 5 bridesmaids and the bride were able to get ready for the wedding at the house and we were able to serve the bridal party a big breakfast the morning of the wedding. Plenty of cooking space, equipment and plenty of table seating! Love the big table by the window overlooking the lake! This house was unique in that it could accommodate so many people. Also, comfortable furniture to relax in! Very charming home. Would love to return when we aren’t preparing for a big wedding, although it was the perfect place to do that! Thank you Stephanie and Matthew

This is a great house with a beautiful view. The lake was amazing and the house was very clean and inviting. We were talking all weekend about how beautiful and spacious the house is. The host responded very promptly any time we needed them.
This is a beautiful and comfortable home right on Lake Mitchell. The four of us had a wonderful mini vacation.
great place to stay
Great location. House furnished to host up to 10 guests very easily. Owners fast to respond. WIFI awesome. "Alexa" helps you with music and lights. Will be back for sure.
This was a fantastic place to stay. Our kids loved it, and the hosts were very accommodating.
Place was everything we could ask for plus some!

This cottage is awesome beyond words! The beds were super comfortable! The view of the lake from the large picture windows was breathtaking! The kitchen was a cook’s dream come true! There are multiple living areas that allowed our group to disburse for varying activities. What a wonderful weekend!! We can’t wait to return! Thank you so much for sharing this magical home with us!

Our group of 8 was so delighted with this lakeside rental we got for our annual winter trip in late January. The place has everything you'd need, plus the view of the frozen lake was postcard-esque. The cooks in the group were impressed with the well-stocked kitchen and there was so much space to spread out and play games, put together puzzles, etc. It was perfect. If you're a light sleeper, bring ear plugs because the snowmobiles get going on the lake early-ish. Five stars for the space and Stephanie and Matt's timely communication!
Very comfortable family home with an amazing view!

Our extended family including 6 adults and 5 toddlers under 5 spent
two nights around Christmas at this wonderful home. Spacious rooms, awesome well stocked kitchen, and cozy bedrooms. There were even some toys to play with! We cooked Christmas meals including breakfast pancakes, and turkey dinner. The owners responded quickly to our questions. Thanks so much! We will be back!
Spacious house. Perfect for large family gathering. Very large kitchen made Thanksgiving dinner prep a breeze.
Beautiful setting right on the water. lots of space to spread out in. ideal for larger families. Close to downtown.
Great place to stay. Lots of room and great location on the lake. We used the fire pit and had a great view of the lake! Would highly recommend this place.

We had a great visit at Stephanie's property. It's a beautiful location and the house is as presented in pictures. My only suggestion would be add a handrail on all of the stairs. Half of the stairway does not have a handrail and that limited older folks from going upstairs. We also traveled with our baby and it would have been an added security while carrying a child. We absolutely loved the large table in front of the picture window by the lake and the bonfire pit. We would stay again!

This Dutch Colonial is an expansive family-oriented house with a 180° view of Lake Mitchell, an easy walk to a convenience store. A well-equipped kitchen and game room only add to the fun, along with a lakeside bonfire pit and fenced-in front yard. We were there in late October when the boats had been taken in, so we can't speak to the water sports it offers. The lake views are ever-changing and mesmerizing.
Great place
We had a great stay at Stephanie & Matt’s place! It’s very child friendly & worked well for our annual family reunion!
Great place! Nice and big for large groups.
Great place for a little get away.

This was the perfect little getaway for our family. Host had all the details covered to make our trip relaxing and enjoyable. The backyard was perfect for our kids who spent the majority of their time paddle boarding and swimming in the clean/shallow water.

What wonderful accommodations for our large group. The location was perfect and the relaxing waterside setting was perfect. Our hosts were very accommodating and made everything easy as this was my first experience with renting through Airbnb. We will definitely be looking forward to another stay in the future.
Plenty of room in the house for the rainy days and perfect location on the lake.

Great vacation! We loved staying at Stephanie’s house! They thought of everything! Seriously, down to the marshmallow roasting sticks. Beautiful weather, lovely house, great location. We kayaked on Pine River, we rented ATVs from Dan at Happy Trails, fished off the canoe (caught some Pike), ate ice cream nightly from Thirsties (across the street), paddle boarded, played croquet, did puzzles, had nightly fires right by the lake and watched the sun set.
Kitchen had everything to cook meals for our family of 7! The house had lots of room to spread out, which was great with 5 teen and young adult children. Lots of games, outdoor toys, and a tv with Netflix for family movies.
Great communication!
We would love to visit again!

Second time staying here and didn’t disappoint. Cadillac doesn’t have a lot to do compared to some northern towns, but if you’re looking for a place to just unwind, this is it! The house has plenty of space and bedrooms for extended families to stay without feeling like you’re all on top of each other. It’s right on the dock and has great views of the lake. Town is only a short drive away, but the kitchen has enough pots and pans and a grill that it’s been more fun to cook at home. The house is “well lived in” but that is part of the charm of going to a cottage in my opinion. Bed are comfortable, lots of windows for a great breeze, and plenty of activities.

Great place for a group to gather. Lots of room to find your own space or interact together. The kitchen is big and well stocked with dishes and pots and pans. We all enjoyed the lawn games, paddle boards, and water mats. The lake does remain shallow for quite a distance as stated in the description. If you plan to rent a pontoon or boat, I would recommend making arrangements before your time begins. We spent many hours around the fire pit - plenty of wood was available.
Great property and location!
Great place to relax, lakefront comfort, spacious enough for a group (we had 7). Close enough to town for shopping. Everything we needed was provided, just like home!
This place was everything we needed. Great space, great location just 15 minutes to Caberfae Peaks where we went skiing. Most importantly great, quick and east communication with our hosts.
Really unique place. Great location. Lots to do in the house and the area.

The house was clean and organized. They offered lots of local info and left cute touches in the house. We went to be in close proximity to caberfae to ski, and it was great (easy to go there and back on warming up breaks). Looked like a lot of snowmobiles and ice fishing. Plenty of room for two families and lots of extra blankets and towels. I'd stay again.

Summer must be great there, but winter was fantastic! Close to the ski hill and plenty of room for two families with a total of six kids to spread out and relax and thaw out. Fantastic access and thoughtful prep for our arrival. Plenty of towels and a well-stocked kitchen for making meals.
Our stay was great. We enjoyed the ice-fishing on the lake and skiing at Caberfae (20 mins away). The house is spacious with plenty of room to spread out and lovely views of the lake.

Stephanie’s house was the perfect place for a quick weekend trip with family. There was plenty of space to get comfortable and was just 15-20 minutes from Caberfae, which with many of us skiing was a big plus. This space would make for an incredible summer stay, too.
Great big house with a cozy cottage atmosphere in each room

We had such a great stay. The house was clean and very spacious, large enough to house 10 of us very comfortably! We walked right onto the lake every day to go icefishing. It was the perfect location for our ice fishing trip! We would definitely stay here again

We enjoyed our stay here! Great location for a trip to Caberfae Peaks. The house was clean, had plenty of amenities, and was very spacious for our group. All nine people were able to sleep comfortably. Definitely would like to stay here again during the summer months. Thank you!
We stayed at Stephanie’s to ski Caberfae. It was close to the hill and very cozy. My daughters were very happy and if babies are happy mama is happy. Thanks for the memories! We will stay again!
Perfect for family relaxation. Great layout for playing cards, watching movies and big suppers. Can’t wait to visit when it’s warm enough to swim!
Fantastic house, so cozy, great layout and a perfect getaway for the weekend.
Fantastic view of the lake! Well stocked with supplies and very clean! We will rent again!
Had an amazing weekend! Gorgeous view and a gorgeous, spacious house. Very clean and well stocked with everything we needed! We want to come back for sure!

This home is very spacious and welcoming. Lots of amenities in the kitchen and bedrooms. Our family appreciated the spacious living areas for all of us to hang out and do our own thing but still be “together”.
10/10 would recommend. Wonderful home with fantastic views and things to do
Not as clean as I had hoped. Also, not great for toddlers just learning to walk as there are many single steps from room to room and marble steps at the entrance too large for a gate.
Matthew and Stephanie’s place was a perfect place to enjoy a weekend away with friends. Thanks for making your home a fun place to be! Awesome awesome awesome!
Great location. House was very well stocked, lots of amenities. We would definitely return again.
We will visit again. Such a good place. Response quick. Feel like home.

This is the perfect place for a family get away! The house is wonderful with great lawn space and you cannot beat having your own private access to lake! Even in cooler temps canoe rides and playing in sand were perfect way to spend day and you cannot beat the bonfire at night and the sunset! We had 4 kids ages 8 months -5 yo and it was perfect for entertaining them. We will definitely be back again!

Their home was very clean and they had lots of modern features in the home to make our stay comfortable and easy. They were very quick to get back with us on anything we needed and it was a beautiful place to stay.

We had a wonderful time at Stephanie and Matt's place! They had everything we needed for our stay. We enjoyed how spacious the cottage is and how it is right on the water and close to town. Would definitely recommend their place, especially for a family get-together!

This house is absolutely LOVELY. My family stayed with another, totaling 4 adults, 1 teen, 4 kids and one baby.
In no particular order, here are some highlights and tidbits of the house:
Don’t blindly in badly trust your GPS. Ours had us turn one road too soon to enter the house. Use their directions :)
The lake is SO shallow near the house (think 24 Inches deep). The kids were easily able to play safely. We brought our own life vests, which is good because there wouldn’t have been enough for all the kids.
The paddle boards were a huge win. Our kids and us adults lived on them.
The house is much larger than we anticipated. Lots of space to spread out. The bedrooms all had adequate blankets. There are three extra mattresses in the closet, so we actually had all of the kids in the one room (three mattresses on the floor and two in twin beds).
There is a crib in the mermaid room with a twin bed.
The kitchen is large. Toaster, griddle, double oven, lots of bowls and pans.
The yard has gates so kids can freely play in the grass.
There were plenty of bath towels, and sheets and blankets.
We saw the most beautiful sunrises and sunsets.
If we return to Michigan, we would absolutely stay at this house again.
Stephanie's home is inviting, comfortable, and equipped with everything you could need. Our group has now stayed here twice and each time, Stephanie and Matt are very responsive and helpful.
Great location and house. Perfect for families.

The host is VERY diligent in her communication with me! Something that really for me personally sets the tone for a comfortable relaxing week :) we’ve been renting places for 6 years and this yard was BY FAR the best yet!!!! We’re hoping to make this our every year rental it was just perfect... the right amount of sun and shade for all to enjoy.
Thank you, Stephanie and Matthew! You’re home is a little slice of paradise!

This is an outstanding find! The hosts are really great at communicating, and you can’t beat the lakefront! The hosts have included so many extras, including the use of paddle boards. We hope to stay again soon!
Amazing location and great hosts!
Awesome location. Beautiful view of the lake. Spacious living. Easy to communicate with the hosts.

Dont bring seasonings or the staples like oil, ketchup or mustard. The house has all of that. The house has two large dining tables. The larger table seats at least 10. Plenty of outside chairs, beach toys and water floaties. The paddle boards are really nice ones. The water is perfect for little kids.

This house was just what we were looking for. Matt and Stephanie included so many extras; pots/pans, coffee, beach towels, rafts, paddle boards, extra mattresses and so much more! They were always quick to respond to questions and very friendly. We will definitely be back!
Amazing house, efficient location, space, and resources. Plan to come up many more times after visiting once

Our family really enjoyed our long weekend stay at Stephanie’s home! We couldn’t have spent it better anywhere else. Both Stephanie and Matthew were responsive and attentive to our questions. Loved the kitchen and everything that was provided for our young children to stay entertained and away from electronics! We look forward to coming again! Thank you!
Great house, exactly as advertised. Perfect for a big group

Idlewind is a large, spacious home on the shores of Lake Mitchell in Cadillac, Michigan.
The hosts are great at responding to all questions promptly. They’ve set up their yard with a number of seating areas, so that it’s easy to enjoy a day in the sun on the lake.
There are a few stones on the sandy lake bottom, so you may want to bring water shoes.
This is a great location for families to gather.

Stephanie and Matt were phenomenal hosts. Very quick to answer messages. The house was perfect with ample space for our family. We enjoyed having dinner, while looking out over the lake. Beautiful space with a beautiful view of the lake.

We really enjoyed our stay. We're also automation fans so having Alexa on hand was a nice touch. We liked all the varied spaces to hang out in, and thought it was a delightfully unique home. We might come back in the summer or for ice fishing next year!

House has a old world charm with touches of the modern life. A lot of nice touches for travelers. All the stuff you need to enjoy the trip without the hassle of finding a store to buy life’s necessities.
Amazing place, Very Clean, View of Lake is Great, Pellet grill for cooking is Awesome.

We loved staying here. It was very spacious and clean. We had 4 couples in our group, and there was plenty of space and enough bedrooms for everyone. And this home is only about 10 to 15 minutes away from the Caberfae ski resort, which was so convenient!
Beautiful home, great location and clean space!
Big,spacious and updated nicely. Plenty of amenities. Very comfortable.
This is our second year in a row coming here and it was as good as I remembered! Would absolutely choose to stay here again!

This was a great place to stay for our three generation ski trip. Plenty of room for everyone to spread out and still spend time together. The large kitchen is fully stocked with all the supplies you need to prepare meals. Stephanie is generous in providing multiple kinds of coffee and tea and other kitchen basics. The beds are clean and comfortable. We only stayed for the weekend and the grandkids are already begging to come back. I highly recommend this house for your stay.

This place was perfect for our group! The home was accurately described and had all of amenities necessary for a great stay. We appreciated the open layout of living spaces, well stocked kitchens, and cozy bedrooms and wouldn’t hesitate to return! Perfect for a summer or winter getaway.
Great location. Wonderful space. Cadillac are does not get the attention it should receive.
House is HUGE! Was in a great location and lots of room.
Outstanding place. Beautiful and convenient location. Cozy and comfortable. Will be back!

Large, comfortable home was just what I was looking for to get together with my kids and grandkids. Plenty of room for us all and the large kitchen made cooking and cleanup a breeze. We had a wonderful time and will look to be back in the summer.
Great property! Great hosts!

Loved our stay at Idlewood! The cottage was above and beyond and so was the hospitality! Matt and Stephanie were great hosts and provided wonderful touches that enhanced our stay. We loved the fireplace and the fire pit by the lake. The view from the cottage was spectacular!!

Extremely kind hosts with quick response time! They had everything we could possibly need and more. Great location on the lake and also a great middle ground for heading to Lake Michigan or Traverse City!
Great space with plenty of room, awesome yard, beautiful views, and a great location. We had a really good time, and will stay again. Highly recommend.
Nice, clean, quiet and fantastic spot! Hosts are accommodating and friendly! Enjoyed our stay. Would go back!

They stay at Stephanie and Matt's place on mitchell lake was great! We had 10 adults travelling for a fishing tournament. The house was clean and had plenty of room to sleep everyone with the addition of a couple air mattresses. The house had more room than expected and some great views of the lake!

This property is very true to the listing and photos. The layout is great with a very open main floor allowing the whole family to spread out but all be together. The fenced in area is great for the younger children as well as a sandbox area down by the water. Nice in ground bonfire pit and very spacious kitchen with everything you need to feed a big family. Upstairs bedrooms are spacious and 3 of 5 bedrooms face the water.
Very spacious! We very much enjoyed that there was plenty of room for our group of 7. The back yard lends itself well to activities and enjoying the lake.

They aren’t exaggerating when they use the word “spacious” in the description. Everything is as described or better. Stephanie and Matt are generous and hospitable hosts. We found great value for the price!

Matt and Stephanie were wonderful hosts and we are already talking about returning next year. The fenced in portion of the yard was a great addition for small kids, who then didn't have to be watched so closely near the water 24/7. The house is open, with lots of living space and a great kitchen. We loved our stay!

Perfect place to spend our week long family vacation! The home was well stocked and had everything we needed. Plenty of room to spread out but also quaint spots to hang out. We had amazing weather and took advantage of the water toys, bonfire pit, yard games, and dock space for our boat. There was plenty of parking for all the cars and our boat trailer. We loved walking to Thirsty’s for odds n ends. The hosts were quick to respond and incredibly helpful during the entire process. We are already talking about when we can come back!!

Our family of 5 had a great time staying here on our visit to Michigan and didn't want to leave the lake! The paddle boards and canoe were such a nice thing to take advantage of on the nice days and the shallow area of the lake was nice for wading around. We enjoyed plenty of fires lakeside and it was SO convenient to have Thirsty's Party Store right across the driveway for those forgotten items and evening ice cream cones! Definitely do a homemade pizza on the pellet grill as recommended by the hosts. The inside provided plenty of space for us to all spread out. We spent a lot of time in the mornings sipping coffee in the den overlooking the lake and even got a beautiful lightening show our last night there. I would come back here in a heartbeat!

Really great experience. The house was really nice, clean and had some nice extras like paddle boards, a fire pit, and a wood pellet grill. The swimming area was nice, had a big shallow area which was perfect for the kids.

The house and property were fantastic. We had a wonderful, relaxing weekend. The paddle boards and canoe were wonderful for enjoying the lake. The yard games were great to have and we played often. The setting is beautiful, the sunsets and sunrises were amazing (this house gives you a view of both). Great lake views from the house. Everything you could ever need was provided from the fully stocked kitchen & bathrooms to the outdoor offerings of chairs, grill etc. They honestly thought of everything! Stephanie always responded to our texts quickly (Note: If I had read all of her very thorough instructions I would not have even had to text her- sorry Stephanie). Would definitely recommend this place and hope to someday return to enjoy again! Thanks for a beautiful, peaceful getaway!

We had a wonderful stay at Idlewild. The home was beautiful, with an old world charm that felt like a true getaway, while still boasting modern upgrades. There was plenty of room for our large clan to spread out, but cozy rooms where we could spend time together as well. Our son is already asking if we can go back when the weather warms up, so that we can better enjoy the lake! I would 100% recommend Stephanie and Matt as hosts, as they were impeccable, and their hospitality made our trip even more delightful.

For us the entire place was perfect. We had a large group and the waterfront views and common areas were exactly what we wanted. 12 adults could all come together in a central area that not many places could accomplish.
This home is beautiful! Great lake access, huge rooms, lots of amenities, and the hosts are extremely helpful. Would love to book again!
Very spacious living areas, plenty of bedrooms. I love the technology. And the view is probably the best in Cadillac.

I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend this house for your next stay in Cadillac. Stephanie and Matt have all the bases covered and the view of the lake is outstanding. The location is great and the house is clean. Thanks Stephanie and Matt!

Idlewood is an absolutely lovely place! Lots of parking space, multiple sleeping options, an amazing view of the lake, and a feeling of being home (away from home)! Owners were fantastic at answering messages and even offered ideas of restaurants to try in the area. My writing group was so comfortable there that they'd like to return next year!

This place was to good to be true! Me, my sister and all of our kids had a great time in this extra big house. Just like previous reviews, it had everything we could have possibly forgotten!! LOL! It was very easy to find with lots of parking.

This was probably one of the cleanest and best smelling AirBNB homes we have ever stayed in. The kitchen is huge and well stocked. We had 4 adults and 5 kids and there was plenty of space for all of us to spread out. We enjoyed the puzzles and games when we were tired out from a few days of skiing at Caberfae and the weather turned bad. The view of the lake was beautiful and the kids enjoyed walking on the frozen lake. We would definitely stay at this home again.

Our family and friends really enjoyed staying in the welcoming home with beautiful surroundings. House was clean with fresh scent, kitchen very well equipped. After the day of skiing in Caberfae Peaks it was great to relax and play fun games. We watched snowmobiles passing by on the frozen lake.

GREAT spot for a winter break. The location is great for ice fishing, skiing and snowmobiling. Having the lake access next door is nice for getting to/from the lake. Stores, restaurants and bars within a mile worked out perfect! Overall, it’s a well appointed home setup for relaxing!

Matt and Stephanie were fantastic from the beginning to end of our experience! They were accommodating for our group and responsive from before we booked up through check-out. The space and location are beautiful, even bigger than they look in the pictures! A great spot for a family or group to stay. Highly recommend their house for anything in the Cadillac area, year round!
Location is perfect for ice fishing! Lake access right next to the property.

This place was fantastic!
The views are spectacular. We enjoyed how spacious the place was too. Just up the road from Caberfae.
Super clean, wonderful host with quick response and awesome view of the lake. Beautiful home with great amenities that I feel was very fairly priced. Would highly recommend!

We came up to stay over the New Year with two other couples to ski. It was located across the street from a convenience store, which was wonderful and close to Caberfae Peaks! The view was great of the water and we are already talking about planning a trip in the summer and hoping to return! Plenty of space for groups!

Thank you so much! You have a beautiful place and we really enjoyed staying at your place. Convenient, great amenities, and great response. We had a great family ski trip and enjoyed relaxing in your home at end of day!
Extremely comfortable and beautiful lakefront property that was absolutely perfect for our weekend siblings' retreat.

Stephanie and her husband were great hosts and quick to reply when we had a question. The beautiful view from the large table made our Thanksgiving dinner very special. The home was quite spacious for the ten of us, with plenty of room to play games, read quietly, watch TV or have fun with Alexa. Cadillac is a short drive away where we enjoyed some shopping. Our time at Stephanie's lakefront home was wonderful!
We loved our stay. Its a beautiful updated home right on the lake. The kitchen is large and well stocked. It was perfect for us since we love to cook!

The place is amazing. Lots of space and even though it rained the whole time I would immediately come back! Super clean house with Lake access, nicely designed interior and all the smart home features you can with for!

It is a great house and host! Even though the weekend we stayed were either raining or cloudy, we still had a great time in the house and at Cadillac area. The house is clean, and all the preparation made us feel like home. We already want to come back next year!
We had such a wonderful time at Stephanie’s. Their home is so pretty and fun. We enjoyed making s’mores outside by the lake on the cool fall evenings. Thanks for sharing.
Great cottage with a beautiful view of the lake, especially from the first floor bedroom.  The place was clean and had plenty of room for my group.
